title: 3.6 POST RELEASE TASK: update site tutorial.html to link to versioned tutorial
description: Unless we have an alternate strategy in place for dealing with versioned docs by the time 3.6 is released, then as a post-release task, once the 3.6 javadocs are snapshoted online (ie: http://lucene.apache.org/solr/api/) the current "online" copy of the tutorial (http://lucene.apache.org/solr/tutorial.html) should be pruned down so that it is just a link to the snapshot version released with 3.6

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content: Suggested contents for http://lucene.apache.org/solr/tutorial.html ... A copy of the tutorial for each version of Solr is included in the documentation for that release. Copies of the tutorial for the most recent releas of each major branch can also be found online: - 3.6 - 4x trunk (unreleased for developers only) ..and maybe at some point we can do a youtube embed of a walk through of the tutorial on that page as well
